creator: RightCom
descriptionHtml:
Are you facing problems like unorganized waiting areas, increased customer waiting time, increased employee idle time or frustrated customers due to unfair serving?

RightQ Kiosk is the self-service Android Kiosk that works with your RightQ - Smart Queue Management solution.

With RightQ Kiosk installed in your waiting area, your customer can:
- Join the right queue by selecting a service
- Fill the identification form
- Get notified via SMS or print a ticket

RightQ is a simple and user-friendly queue management system. It allows you to monitor and control the whole customer journey when they are in your premises. The different features provide more flexibility in the daily management and real-time control. Improving the customer experience and increasing profits has never been easier.
descriptionShort: The Queue Management app that enhance the customer experience in your premises.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Correct the greeting.

title: RightQ Kiosk

descriptionShort: The Queue Management app that enhance the customer experience in your premises.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This version of RightQ Kiosk allows you to personalize your customers journey on the application. It boasts of a sleeker interface with legible text and increased sensitivity making your customers spend less time on the queue. Your customers now have more insights on their position in the queue as well as the estimated waiting time on the services they require and the areas they want to be served. While you explore this version of RightQ Kiosk, we're busy making that experience even better.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed USB Printing Issue on 24-inch Kiosk Devices:
- We've addressed an issue that was affecting the USB printing process on 24-inch kiosk devices. Now, your printing tasks should proceed seamlessly without any hiccups.
- Botswana Phone Number Correction:
- We've fixed a bug related to Botswana phone numbers starting with 78[2-7]. You can now enter these numbers without any issues, ensuring smooth communication.
- Code Review and Refactoring
